item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: I wrote up the story of the Pectra incident on Sepolia, its an interesting story about edge cases, coordination and an attacker who swooped in and made our lives much harder!
Check it out (4min read):
https://mariusvanderwijden.github.io/blog/2025/03/08/Sepolia/
item.dc:creator: @vdWijden

Let’s keep going.

item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: We're working with @Powerloom to make this migration happen smoothly. More details coming soon.
If you're an OP Stack chain with a custom gas token and want to keep it, get in touch with us. We can help you migrate to @arbitrum quickly and handle all the heavy lifting.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
We're working with @Powerloom to make this migration happen smoothly. More details coming soon.

If you're an OP Stack chain with a custom gas token and want to keep it, get in touch with us. We can help you migrate to @arbitrum quickly and handle all the heavy lifting.

item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: I’ve joined @conduitxyz, leading our Ecosystem Partnerships! Conduit handles 60% of Ethereum’s onchain compute by offering the most performant and reliable infrastructure and is backed by top investors like @paradigm and @HaunVentures.
Conduit is powering 55+ mainnet (and 300+ testnet) networks while processing billions of monthly RPC calls. We work with standout customers like @ProofofPlay, @Blackbird_xyz, @Synthetix_io, and @Azuki.
Plus, we have 75+ ecosystem partners like @arbitrum, @Optimism, @celestia, @eigenlayer, @thirdweb, @circle, @dune, @privy_io, @RelayProtocol, and dozens more! (DM to chat about partnering with our ecosystem!)
My goal is to connect top-notch builders with technical partners while continuously and holistically strengthening our offering. Excited to advance Conduit’s mission to scale Ethereum!
item.dc:creator: @AndyDotETH
item.description:
I’ve joined @conduitxyz, leading our Ecosystem Partnerships! Conduit handles 60% of Ethereum’s onchain compute by offering the most performant and reliable infrastructure and is backed by top investors like @paradigm and @HaunVentures.

Conduit is powering 55+ mainnet (and 300+ testnet) networks while processing billions of monthly RPC calls. We work with standout customers like @ProofofPlay, @Blackbird_xyz, @Synthetix_io, and @Azuki.

Plus, we have 75+ ecosystem partners like @arbitrum, @Optimism, @celestia, @eigenlayer, @thirdweb, @circle, @dune, @privy_io, @RelayProtocol, and dozens more! (DM to chat about partnering with our ecosystem!)

My goal is to connect top-notch builders with technical partners while continuously and holistically strengthening our offering. Excited to advance Conduit’s mission to scale Ethereum!

item.title:
unpopular opinion
we built decentralized systems to create an institutional alternative but then we are looking for institutions adoption
mmm is this cognitive dissonance?

item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: 📊 Phala Cloud Weekly Growth (Feb 23 → March 01)
📈 Total Users: 341 → 438 (+28.4%) 🟢 Active Users: 92 → 117 (+27.2%) 💻 Total VMs: 618 → 670 (+8.4%) 🚀 Running VMs: 146 → 191 (+30.8%)
item.dc:creator: @marvin_tong
item.description:
📊 Phala Cloud Weekly Growth
(Feb 23 → March 01)

📈 Total Users: 341 → 438 (+28.4%)
🟢 Active Users: 92 → 117 (+27.2%)
💻 Total VMs: 618 → 670 (+8.4%)
🚀 Running VMs: 146 → 191 (+30.8%)
